translation.en: Come on. It's OK. Go. Go, go.

- Ça va. Continuez. - On y va !
Préparer vous à subir un examen cutané. Si vous poussez, vous resterez derrière.

Hey, hey, hey! Back up! Whoa! Whoa!
Step down! No pushing, people! No pushing!
If you can't listen, you will be turned away.

translation.en: If you're going to Camp B, prepare for a skin check.

Move forward. Ma'am, remove your sunglasses.

Tout le monde retire ses lunettes.

translation.en: and be ready for eye check and skin check.

translation.en: Hey. Hey, easy. Please. It's OK. It's OK.

translation.en: It's OK, honey, we're coming right now. It's OK.

Tous les évacués doivent être au stade avant le 7 juin. Merci. On arrive, trésor.

translation.en: We've been running. We've been running.
I have a lot of... a lot of layers on, that's all.

translation.en: Wait! No, no, no, no! Where are you taking him?
Officer! Officer! Our daughter's on the truck!

translation.en: -I don't have a weapon. -Stay there, sweetheart.

translation.en: Sweetheart, just stay there. Stay there. Stay there.

translation.fr: M. l'officier, je vous en prie.

translation.en: I just have an upset stomach.
No, sir. It's just a stomach cramp.

translation.en: Please, sir, my daughter's already on the truck--

translation.en: Please, we've been waiting for so long!
Shut the fuck up. Shut the fuck up. Unbutton your shirt.
translation.fr: - On a beaucoup couru. - Fermez-la ! - La ferme. Votre chemise. - Maman !

translation.en: Is this... is this really necessary? I...

translation.en: I repeat, we are authorized to open fire,
Please. Please. My daughter is already on the truck!
translation.fr: S'il vous plaît. Ma fille est dans le camion.

translation.en: Hands in the air! Get down!

translation.fr: Non. Tout va bien. Tiens bon. Non !

translation.en: -Daddy! -No! No, no, no, no, no! No!
translation.fr: Tout va bien. Tiens bon. Non !

translation.en: Baby, you wait for me! You wait for me at the stadium!
I promise I will be there! You wait for us! You wait for us! Oh!
Come on! Come on! Come, come! Come on, come on! Please! Come on! Go!
Come on! Come on! Come on! Go, go, go! This way, Rose.
translation.fr: - Il faut y aller. - Par ici.

translation.en: She's all alone now. She's all alone.
We need to get you some more antibiotics.
They'll be moving slowly with all the roadblocks. We'll, um...
translation.fr: Ils n'iront pas vite, avec tous les barrages.

translation.en: We'll get to her on foot. We'll find another car.
translation.fr: On la rejoindra à pied. On trouvera une voiture.

translation.en: We'll meet her at the stadium, OK?
Have some water and then we go, OK?
translation.fr: Bois un peu d'eau et on y va.

translation.en: They're never gonna let you through with me.
translation.fr: On te laissera jamais passer si je suis là.
C'est vrai, Rose. Ils savent rien.

translation.en: They don't know what the hell is going on and everything is falling apart, babe.
translation.fr: Il ne savent pas ce qui se passe et tout s'effondre.

translation.en: Stop. Stop. I don't need to hear this right now. Stop.
translation.fr: Arrête. Je veux pas entendre ça maintenant.

translation.en: They don't have a plan for us, Rose.
translation.fr: Ils ne savent pas quoi faire de nous, Rose.
Il n'y a pas de filet de sécurité.

translation.en: We are on our own, do you understand that?
translation.fr: On est tout seuls, tu comprends ?

translation.en: What does that have to do with our daughter?
Do you want to leave her out there?
translation.fr: - Tu veux la laisser seule ? - Non.

translation.en: You want to leave her there? You want to leave her alone?
-Is that what you want? -No, I don't! No!
I want you to go alone.

translation.en: I'm not gonna make it, Rose.
translation.fr: J'y arriverai pas. - J'y arriverai pas, Rose. - Non.

translation.en: I'm not gonna be let through anywhere.
Any place we go, I'm gonna keep you out.
translation.fr: - On ne nous laissera entrer nulle part. - Non.

translation.en: No. I am not leaving you here.
translation.fr: - Je ne t'abandonnerai pas ici. - S'il te plaît.
- Non. - Ma chérie, il le faut.

translation.en: -Listen to me. You have to. -No. I can't. I can't, OK?
translation.fr: - Non. - Ma chérie, il le faut. Je ne peux pas. Écoute.

translation.en: Listen, let's go together, OK? I cannot do this on my own.

translation.en: I cannot do it on my own. I cannot do it. Listen.
Baby, please. No, no, no, no. Listen to me, OK? Listen. Hey.
translation.fr: - Écoute-moi, ma chérie. - Non, toi, écoute-moi.

translation.en: Let's find her together, OK? We're gonna find her together.
translation.fr: On la retrouvera ensemble. On va la trouver ensemble.

translation.en: We're gonna know. We're gonna find her together. It's OK.
translation.fr: Tout ira bien. On va la retrouver tous les deux.

translation.en: So, so, so, so, so much.
You have to trust me. I will get us there.
translation.fr: Tu dois me faire confiance. Je nous conduirai là-bas.

translation.en: I'm gonna get you some more water, OK?
translation.fr: Je vais te chercher de l'eau.

translation.en: I need to go to the stadium.
I need to get my daughter.
Get the fuck out of here.
Go! Now, get out! Get out! Get the fuck out of here!
Please. Please, I beg you, please.
My family's back there. We need to get to the stadium.

translation.en: Can give us a ride, please? We have food.
I don't think that that is a good idea.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une bonne idée.

translation.en: Ma'am, you have kids, right? You have kids, huh? Grandkids?

translation.en: I'm sorry, I can't. It's not safe out here.
translation.fr: - Désolée, je ne peux pas. - C'est dangereux, ici.

translation.en: Not alone in a car. It is very unsafe.
translation.fr: Et seule en voiture, aussi. C'est dangereux. Des gens vous barreront la route,

translation.en: People will roadblock you. They'll steal your gas
translation.fr: C'est dangereux. Des gens vous barreront la route, voleront votre essence et vous laisseront pour morte.

translation.en: and leave you for dead. I know. I'm a good person.
translation.fr: voleront votre essence et vous laisseront pour morte. Je suis un homme bien. C'est pas le cas de tout le monde.

translation.en: Not everybody, though. Not out here.

translation.en: I need... I need to find my husband.
I'll help you. You need a man with you.
translation.fr: Je vous aiderai. Je vous protégerai. J'ai vu ce qui se passe ici.
Je vous protégerai. J'ai vu ce qui se passe ici.

translation.en: I need to get to the stadium.
translation.fr: - Je dois aller au stade. - On ira ensemble.

translation.en: Yes, we'll do it. Please, ma'am, I beg you.

translation.en: I will protect you and get you to the stadium safely.
translation.fr: de vous protéger et de vous conduire au stade.

translation.en: Do you know what street this is? This is Hastings.
Can you get to the stadium from here? I sure can.

translation.en: OK! Would you like me to drive?

translation.en: You may as well... This isn't even my car.

translation.en: You don't have to explain. I understand. We do what we have to out here.

Je vais sur le siège passager.

translation.en: So, how old are your kids?
You're messing with me. Please. Shit! Get out of the car or I'll hurt you.

translation.en: You are going straight to hell, you piece of shit!

translation.en: Get out of the car! I'll punch you in the fucking face, bitch!

Sors de la voiture, vieille pute, ou je t'éclate la tronche ! C'est verrouillé, connard !

translation.en: You're going to hell, fucker! Whatever, lady!

translation.en: Are you sure this is the right street?

translation.en: This is where he said. I just... I think it's that way.

translation.en: Unless you think we missed it.

translation.en: -I don't know. -You're the one that wrote it.

translation.en: Would you please just calm down for a second?

translation.en: Damn it! This happens every time!
I'm just trying to figure this out right now.

translation.en: OK, I think we head east on Madison.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. No. Please, don't! Don't...

translation.en: Look out! Look out! Look out!
Help me, man! Hey, man! Fuckin' help me!
This area is under mandatory evacuation.

Cette zone doit être évacuée. Partez tout de suite. Prends tes affaires.

translation.en: Don't let him out of your sight. We'll be back with transport.

translation.en: And don't get too comfortable, sunshine.

translation.en: We're gonna go for a ride.
I'm not the guy you're looking for.

translation.en: Yeah, that's not your problem, though.
You just do what you're told. Doesn't matter what's right.
translation.fr: Tu fais ce qu'on te dit. - Juste ou pas. - La ferme !

translation.en: -Shut up. -All I'm saying, man, is you don't even know what's the charge.

translation.en: Some of y'all are taking the opportunity
translation.fr: Certains d'entre vous... vous voulez juste régler vos comptes.
vous voulez juste régler vos comptes.
S'il y a toujours un monde.

translation.en: I hear how they talk to you, giving you all this shit work.
translation.fr: J'ai vu comment ils te parlent. - Tu fais le boulot de merde. - Ta gueule !
- Tu fais le boulot de merde. - Ta gueule ! Calme-toi, frérot.

translation.en: We're just a couple fellas passing the time.

translation.en: -Yeah, well, I've heard enough. -Well, I'ma tell you again.
translation.fr: - T'as assez causé. - Je vais te le redire.
C'est pas moi que vous cherchez.
- Ça te fait rien ? - C'est pas mon problème.

translation.en: Doesn't matter to me. We're dumping you in the brig.

translation.en: There is no more brig, man, where you been?

translation.en: No, no, no. I know where they're taking me.
I know what they're looking for, too. Know what I mean?
translation.fr: Je sais aussi ce qu'ils cherchent. Pas vrai ?
que je serais encore en vie

translation.en: if I didn't have something they want?

translation.en: Huh? If I didn't know some things,

- Des choses qu'ils veulent savoir ? - Mec...

translation.en: What do you say? Some Bonnie and Clyde shit.

Unless you wanna hold my dick for me.

- Alors, tout va bien. - Sérieux, mec.

translation.en: I won't be but a minute.
Why don't you be a dear and help me out?
-Out of our way! -Move to the side!

translation.en: Back the fuck up! Back up!
Ladies and gentlemen, this access point is closed, OK?

translation.en: Let us through, that's an order!

translation.en: -That's a negative, sir. -I need to get to my daughter!

translation.en: Can't you hear that? We're under attack!
And what the fuck are you gonna do about it?

translation.en: We can't do shit, you're on your own, lady!
-Officer, open the gate now! -Sir, evacuation's complete!

translation.en: -We can't let anyone else in! -You took my fucking daughter

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! Shut the fuck up!

translation.en: Hey, you can come with us.
